title: Shamanic Magic Incantations Sound Pack
description: A collection of magical spells used by Viking shamans, ancient tribal sorcerers, warlocks, black magicians and witches. The package contains 240 sound effects.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/shamanic-magic-incantations-sound-pack

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/e2rv6ak89ay5yvr/MSE%20-%20Shamanic%20Magic%20Incantations%20Sound%20Pack_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of magical spells used by Viking shamans, ancient tribal sorcerers, warlocks, black magicians and witches, containing 12 types of spells.


The package includes 240 sound effects divided into 12 folders for each type of incantations:


  1. The "Acid" folder contains 5 magical spells
  2. The "Arcane" folder contains 16 magical spells
  3. The "Defense" folder contains 17 magical spells
  4. The "Field" folder contains 11 magical spells
  5. The "Force" folder contains 31 magical spells
  6. The "Healing" folder contains 27 magical spells
  7. The "Nordic" folder contains 27 magical spells
  8. The "Potion" folder contains 16 magical spells
  9. The "Power" folder contains 13 magical spells
  10. The "Shamanic" folder contains 31 magical spells
  11. The "Teleport" folder contains 26 magical spells
  12. The "Voice" folder contains 20 magical spells


Some incantations have echoes of musical phrases to give a unique and original sound to these spells.


Use this asset to create magical spells for shamans, warlocks, witches, sorcerers, spirits, good and evil wizards in your game scenes, or use these spells to produce sound for individual gameplay events.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 240 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 12 types of ready-made incantations
  • 27 healing spells
  • 26 teleport spells
  • 27 nordic spells
  • 20 voice spells
  • 16 potion spells
  • 16 arcane spells
  • 17 defense spells
  • 31 force spells and more
  • great for RPGs, strategies, games in the Fantasy, Dark Fantasy genre


Number of Audio Waves: 240

Number of Audio Cues: 240

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 10 minutes 41 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
